recommended_actions.HOOK-WIRING: Align hook script naming/wiring to canonical npc_* contract and verify include/entrypoint mapping.
recommended_actions.LEGACY-UNSUPPORTED: Rewrite unsupported al_* keys to canonical npc_* keys; bridge extension only with approved case + tests.
recommended_actions.AMBIGUOUS-ROUTE: Resolve route/tag naming ambiguity manually and set explicit canonical npc_route_* mapping.
recommended_actions.RUNTIME-PROTECTED: Review protected runtime/content boundary; if content-owned, migrate manually; if runtime-owned, track as governed exception.
recommended_actions.CONFLICTED-CONFIG: Split conflicting old/new patterns and converge on canonical contract before rollout.
recommended_actions.DOC/CONTRACT-DRIFT: Fix drift between content wiring and docs/npc_toolset_authoring_contract.md, then rerun readiness audit.
